title: Open Records Request: Community Public Safety Grant

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Open Records Request: Community Public Safety Grant
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

According to a press release from Gov. Kemp's office on June 8, 2023, the Governor's office awarded more than $83.5 million in grants for 118 qualified projects as part of the Community Public Safety Grant program. This included grants of $1,301,289 and $347,542.80 for two different projects described in additional documents provided by the Governor: https://gov.georgia.gov/sites/gov.georgia.gov/files/2023-06/Grantee%20List%20for%20Public%20Safety%20Release1024_2.jpg

Press Release: https://gov.georgia.gov/press-releases/2023-06-08/gov-kemp-announces-835m-community-public-safety-grant-awards#:~:text=In%20accordance%20with%20grant%20requirements,violence%20resulting%20from%20the%20pandemic.

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of all documents, including but not limited to, applications, agreements, and reporting documents from the "Community Public Safety Grant" program for the two grants of $1,301,289 and $347,542.80 received by the Brookhaven Police Department, as described in the Governor's press release and additional documents. 

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

e

title: Conviction Integrity Unit Case Review Statistics

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Conviction Integrity Unit Case Review Statistics
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- Statistics / number of all requests for conviction review filed since the 2015 inception of the LADA Conviction Integrity Unit.
- Statistics / numbers of all cases accepted for review, and all cases denied.
- Final dispositions of accepted cases.
- Dates of receipt of requests, and dates of letters sent to accept or reject.
- Documentation of standard operating procedure for evaluating requests.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Christa Miller

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Expert Witness - Neuropsychology
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

A list of all criminal cases prosecuted by your office in which Serina Hoover, Psy.D. testified as an expert witness in neuropsychology for the prosecution. Please include dates Dr. Hoover testified, as well as case dispositions.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Christa Miller
